***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2078?focusedCommentId=16974242) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Actually, we already have:
```c++

  ARROW_DISALLOW_COPY_AND_ASSIGN(DataType);
```

Does this issue allude at something else? What exactly?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2078?focusedCommentId=16979733) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
